content: Will the FHIR Ballot Prep page (http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Ballot_Prep) be updated soon for the Sept 2019 cycle? I see the dates on the HL7 calendar but having them all listed out in one place on the Ballot Prep page is very helpful. Thanks
The intention is to redirect everyone to the confluence calendar and not to maintain a separate FHIR calendar page any longer. I'll update the wiki page to point to the Confluence calendar
